name: Bitter Salty Perro
description: A riff on a Salty Dog, this cocktail is excellent with a 100% agave blanco tequila—or try a joven mezcal.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups freshly squeezed pink grapefruit juice from about 4 grapefruits
1 cup blanco tequila or joven mezcal

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pitcher, combine grapefruit juice and tequila or mezcal. Add tonic and fill pitcher with ice. Stir gently to combine.
Rim 4 glasses with kosher salt. Divide cocktail between glasses, adding 2 dashes of bitters to each glass. Serve immediately.
